title.en: A Prayer to the Precious Teacher of Incomparable Kindness, Jamyang Lungtok Gyaltsen

text.en: In the noble land of India, you were Śāntipa, lord of siddhas,
In Tibet, you were Drokmi Palgyi Yeshe, Langdro Lotsāwa,
text.en-trans: bö yül pemé jé zung drok mi dang

text.en: Gyalwa Chokyang and others, guided and cared for by Padmasambhava,
text.en-trans: langdro lotsa gyalwa chok yang sok
drubpé rigdzin nam kyi nam trülpa

text.en: In this degenerate age, you appear as the emanation of Longchenpa, lord of the victorious ones,
text.en-trans: nyik dü gyalwé wangpo longchen dang

text.en: And the glorious Longsal Nyingpo, in the form of a spiritual friend.
text.en-trans: long sal palgyi trulpa shenyen tsül

text.en: Praised and prophesied by vidyādharas of the past,
text.en-trans: rigdzin gongma nam kyi yong ngakpa

text.en: You transmit the teachings to beings the essence of the Dzogchen teachings—
text.en-trans: dzokchen tenpé nyingpo dro la pel

text.en: Jamyang Lungtok Gyaltsen, root teacher, to you I pray!
Throughout the succession of all my lives to come,
text.en-trans: kyé dang trengwa tsé rab tamché du

text.en: May I never be separate from you, my sole protector.
text.en-trans: gönpo khyé dang nam yang mi dralwar

text.en: Through vast, ocean-like activity of perfecting, maturing and purifying,
text.en-trans: dzok min jangwa gyatso tar chin né

text.en: May the deluded perceptions of life, death and the bardo be purified into all-pervading space,
text.en-trans: kyé chi bardö trül nang ying su dak

text.en: And may all beings come to experience the blissful land of Sukhāvatī!
text.en-trans: dro nam dechen zhing la longchö shok
